com.bumptech.glide.load.engine.bitmap_recycle

Interface ArrayAdapterInterface<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Array type (e.g. byte[], int[])
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ByteArrayAdapter, IntegerArrayAdapter

    public interface ArrayAdapterInterface<T>
    Interface for handling operations on a primitive array type.

    • Method Summary
